install.name: Feed Display
install.author: Joomla! Project
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2010 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module allows the displaying of a syndicated feed

param.name: rssurl
param.label: Feed URL
param.description: Enter the URL of the RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for the whole Feed

param.name: rssimage
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show the image associated with the whole Feed

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
